mapper.select: select to_char(count(*)) "ord_cnt" , to_char(nvl(sum(sp.str_pro_salescost*so.str_ord_cnt),0)) "cost_sum" , substr(to_char(so.str_ord_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'),1,13) "str_ord_date" from store_order so, store_product sp where so.str_pro_no = sp.str_pro_no and substr(to_char(so.str_ord_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'),1,10)=#{date} group by substr(to_char(so.str_ord_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'),1,13) order by substr(to_char(so.str_ord_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'),1,13)
